Headline: Brown Line Service has resumed Normal Serivce after an earlier  Raised Bridge
ShortDescription: Brown Line has resumed normal service  after an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service  has resumed normal service after an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown.

We apologize for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience while the Chicago Department of Transportation works to complete the bridge operation. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to fire department activity

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with delays at Pulaski due to fire department activity.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Lawndale
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Kedzie, 59th and Pulaski: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Lawndale.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
